title: 4 shot, 1 fatally, in East Orange
content:
EAST ORANGE, N.J. (AP) — Police and Essex County officials are investigating a shooting incident in which one man died and three others were injured.
East Orange Police say 22-year-old Ahmad M. Crudup, of Maplewood, died shortly before midnight Sunday at University Hospital in Newark.
It happened about 11:30 p.m. Sunday when police responded to reports of gunshots in the 200 block of S. Clinton St.
Officials say the other three victims were male and were treated for non-life-threatening injuries. Their names were not released.
Officials declined to comment further on the incident.
